entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher at Hogwarts who is checking the Firebolt for jinxes. She mentions that Madam Hooch and Professor Flitwick will help her strip it down.

entities.name: madam hooch
entities.description: Madam Hooch is a teacher at Hogwarts who will help Professor McGonagall check the Firebolt.

entities.name: professor flitwick
entities.description: Professor Flitwick is a teacher at Hogwarts who will help Professor McGonagall check the Firebolt.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is Harry's friend and is present when Professor McGonagall takes the Firebolt away.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is Harry's friend and is questioned by Ron about why she went to talk to Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the owner of the Firebolt and is upset when Professor McGonagall takes it away.
